info.title: Nitrite Datagate API
description: An API to synchronize datagate clients with the datagate server
This api follows the json-rpc 2.0 specification. More information available at http://www.jsonrpc.org/specification.

_id.description: The ID of the entity to change

_timestamp.description: The timestamp of this change, to the nearest millisecond

changeItems.description: An array of change items for this change list

collection.description: The name of the collectiont that this change list is for

authenticate.description: Authenticates the user using the provided credentials and creates a new session.

username.description: Username of the user to authenticate.

password.description: Password of the user to authenticate.

authenticated.description: Whether the credentials are correct or not

subscribe.summary: Subscribes to changes on a collection. Can return multiple responses, depending on if there are multiple updates

collection.description: The name of the collection to subscribe to

unsubscribe.summary: Unsubscribes to changes on a collection

collection.description: The name of the collection to unsubscribe from

getCollectionData.summary: Gets all the data of a  collection

collection.description: The name of the collection to get

getChangesSince.summary: Gets all changes on a collection since a certain timestamp

collection.description: The name of the collection to get

timestamp.description: Time in the nearest millisecond since the last update
